Gatherer:SpireHeart.NAME: Spire Heart
DESCRIPTIONS: NL You concentrate on the scent of Potions...

Gatherer:Vampires.NAME: Vampires(?)
DESCRIPTIONS: Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~wanderer,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~

Gatherer:BottleCollector.NAME: Bottle Collector
DESCRIPTIONS: "Look at my collections, stranger!" NL A strange-looking maniac shouts behind hundreds of bottles. NL NL "If ya show me potion @Card,@ I'll spare one." NL NL He adds one more suspicious thing. NL "More #yRare card you pick, #yrarer bottle I give."
"Thank you thank you!" NL The collector seems to be excited too much. NL NL "Now, I want to #rexperiment, ya wanna participate?" NL NL You leave without responding.
You don't bother, and run away without looking back.
